survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Lighting Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart home lighting systems to understand satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current smart home lighting system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
